author: Photo PAP; Jakub Kaczmarczyk
title: 'Poland will not be intimidated by Russian drones': president - English Section
text: 'Poland will not be intimidated by Russian drones': president 11.09.2025 14:30 Poland‚Äôs President Karol Nawrocki said on Thursday that Russia‚Äôs drone incursion into Polish airspace the previous night was meant to test the country‚Äôs readiness to respond and NATO‚Äôs mechanisms, vowing that Poland "will not be intimidated by Russian drones." Polish President Karol NawrockiPhoto: PAP/Jakub Kaczmarczyk "We passed all of these tests," Nawrocki told troops during a visit to the 31st Tactical Air Base in Pozna≈Ñ-Krzesiny in western Poland, a key hub in the country‚Äôs air defence effort. The president travelled to the base a day after Polish and allied aircraft intercepted multiple drones that crossed into Poland during a large-scale Russian strike on Ukraine. Military officials said Polish and allied radar tracked multiple objects and shot down those deemed a direct threat. NEW: Russian drones violated Polish airspace on the night of September 9 to 10 in what NATO and European officials have suggested was an intentional Russian incursion.The large number of Russian drones that violated Polish airspace suggests that this was likely an intentional‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/jiF6tzRwKt ‚Äî Institute for the Study of War (@TheStudyofWar) September 11, 2025 By Thursday, authorities had recovered debris from 16 drones. Gdzie spad≈Çy szczƒÖtki rosyjskich dron√≥w? MSWiA poinformowa≈Ço, ≈ºe wed≈Çug stanu na godzinƒô 20:00 znaleziono szczƒÖtki 16 maszyn. Gdzie dok≈Çadnie? pic.twitter.com/6eYdSVFZJL ‚Äî tvp.info üáµüá± (@tvp_info) September 11, 2025 ‚ÄúThis was a provocation meant to test not only our military capacity, but also the ability of Poland‚Äôs political leadership‚Äîthe president and the prime minister‚Äîto react, as well as the functioning of NATO‚Äôs response mechanisms,‚Äù Nawrocki said. Prezydent RP @NawrockiKn w #Pozna≈Ñ-Krzesiny: Rosyjska prowokacja by≈Ça niczym wiƒôcej tylko pr√≥bƒÖ testowania naszych zdolno≈õci i reagowania. By≈Ça pr√≥bƒÖ sprawdzenia mechanizmu dzia≈Çania w ramach NATO i naszych zdolno≈õci do reakcji. Dziƒôkujƒô Wam, bo wszystkie te testy zdali≈õmy. pic.twitter.com/TNmmzdHoHz ‚Äî Kancelaria Prezydenta RP (@prezydentpl) September 11, 2025 He praised Polish and allied pilots for their role in the operation, which involved AWACS early warning aircraft, F-35 and F-16 fighter jets, Mi-24 attack helicopters and other assets, according to officials. ‚ÄúI feel deep pride that I am commander-in-chief of the Polish armed forces and can say here in Krzesiny that Polish aviation is ready to respond to provocations," he said. Prezydent RP @NawrockiKn w #Pozna≈Ñ-Krzesiny: Czujƒô dumƒô z tego, ≈ºe jestem Zwierzchnikiem Si≈Ç Zbrojnych i mogƒô powiedzieƒá, ≈ºe polskie lotnictwo jest gotowe do reagowania na prowokacje. Bƒôdƒô tak≈ºe wywiƒÖzywa≈Ç siƒô ze wszystkich swoich obowiƒÖzk√≥w bƒôdƒÖc zawsze z Wami, z polskimi‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/0VhQswkzrF ‚Äî Kancelaria Prezydenta RP (@prezydentpl) September 11, 2025 'Poland will not be frightened' Nawrocki also framed the incursion as part of a broader hybrid war waged by Moscow. "Poland will not be intimidated by Russian drones," he declared. "We are a nation that did not yield to the Soviet soldier in 1920, nor to nearly 50 years of communist propaganda after 1945. Poland, with almost 5 percent of GDP going to defence and the strength of our alliance, will not be frightened now." Dzi≈õ (11.09) o godz. 17.00 w Pa≈Çacu Prezydenckim odbƒôdzie siƒô zwo≈Çane przez Prezydenta RP @NawrockiKn posiedzenie Rady Bezpiecze≈Ñstwa Narodowego. pic.twitter.com/RJleO7tGJW ‚Äî Kancelaria Prezydenta RP (@prezydentpl) September 11, 2025 He told the gathering that deterrence depends on constant readiness. Dziƒôkujƒô za to, ≈ºe przeszli≈õmy test solidarno≈õci i gotowo≈õci do tego, aby reagowaƒá na zaczepki i prowokacje Federacji Rosyjskiej - Prezydent RP @NawrockiKn w 31 Bazie Lotnictwa Taktycznego. pic.twitter.com/ohpInCb5lV ‚Äî Kancelaria Prezydenta RP (@prezydentpl) September 11, 2025 ‚ÄúIf we want a future without war, we must be prepared for war every day,‚Äù Nawrocki said, adding that political leaders must carry out their responsibilities "as effectively as the armed forces." Szef BBN S≈Çawomir @Cenckiewicz spotka≈Ç siƒô dzi≈õ z Wicepremierem, Ministrem Obrony Narodowej @KosiniakKamysz oraz ZastƒôpcƒÖ Szefa MON @ZalewskiPawel. Podczas spotkania om√≥wiono ustalenia ubieg≈Çotygodniowej wizyty Prezydenta @NawrockiKn w USA oraz polsko-ameryka≈Ñskich rozm√≥w w‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/eHH7bwk58E ‚Äî BBN (@BBN_PL) September 11, 2025 Polish authorities say the overnight operation marked the first time Russian drones were shot down over NATO territory since Moscow‚Äôs full-scale invasion of Ukraine began in 2022.
